title: Fatal Attraction
description: In this Dateline classic, Beth Lochtefeld seemed to find everything she wanted in a man – looks, money and he was crazy about her. But what she saw, was not what she got. Hoda Kotb reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 19, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
